title: Inbound visitor growth in the Middle East 2011 to 2019
summary: This statistic shows Middle East visitor in growth Middle from 2011 to 2019 .
Middle growth growth were forecasted to increase by 4.3 % in 2019 .
The growth daily rate of the growth industry in the Americas reached around 123.37 U.S. dollars in 2017 .
gold: This statistic shows inbound visitor growth in the Middle East from 2011 to 2019.
In 2016 , inbound visitor numbers to the Middle East grew by 1.2 percent and by around 2.5 percent in the previous year , showing a decline compared to eight percent growth in 2014 .
